backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with data models for referrals, intakes, beds, facilities, access requests, user profiles, and activity logs, including authorization and storage mixins plus state counters.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic that adds a lastUpdatedBy field to existing referral and intake records by transforming old stored data into the new format.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping UI features to affected frontend files, required components, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their role in the application’s UI, routing, admin logic, and data handling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documentation outlining prerequisites and steps for building and deploying the application to production.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the root React container and main script.
frontend/SMOKE_TESTS.md: Manual smoke test procedure for validating production functionality, especially admin access and authentication flows.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile fetching, admin checks, and routing users to dashboards or setup screens.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access-pending message with logout functionality for users awaiting approval.
frontend/src/components/AccessRequestsTa: Admin interface for viewing, approving, or deleting pending partner agency access requests.
frontend/src/components/ActivityLogTab.t: Fetches and paginates activity log entries, formatting user names, actions, and timestamps for display.
frontend/src/components/AdminBedUtilizat: Shows overall and per-program bed utilization statistics, including totals and available/occupied counts.
frontend/src/components/AdminRiskOvervie: Summarizes at‑risk referrals, intakes, and beds for quick admin review, with navigation to detailed tabs.
frontend/src/components/AdminStatusCheck: Fetches and displays admin status, handling loading and error states, and lists all admin principals.
frontend/src/components/BedsTab.tsx: Manages bed assignment, editing, filtering, and archiving with admin-specific preferences and multiple dialogs.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Shows aggregate referral, intake, and bed statistics with loading skeletons and admin-only utilization summary.
frontend/src/components/FacilitiesTab.ts: Provides facility creation and bed addition workflows with dialogs, form validation, and active-bed limits.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays app header with logo, theme toggle, user menu, and logout handling based on profile and admin status.
frontend/src/components/IntakesDataViewT: Displays a sortable table of intakes with status, bed info, case manager, and risk indicators, loading data from query hooks.
frontend/src/components/IntakesTab.tsx: Provides full intake management UI including creation, review, bed assignment, exiting, notes, and a toggle between management and data view modes.
frontend/src/components/PartnerAgencyPro: Allows partner agencies to view and edit their agency profile with validation and save behavior via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/PartnerReferrals: Enables partner agencies to create, view, edit, and resubmit referrals with validation, document upload, and status display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial user profile setup, collecting basic contact info and submitting it through a save profile API.
frontend/src/components/ReferralCountsSu: Computes and displays summary counts of referrals by status using badges within a card.
frontend/src/components/ReferralsTab.tsx: Displays and manages referrals with filtering, sorting, status updates, history, and admin actions.
frontend/src/components/ReferralStatusBa: Renders a badge showing referral status with matching icon, label, and style variant.
frontend/src/components/RequestAccessFor: Provides a form for agencies to request system access and shows a confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/components/StaffOverviewCom: Shows a compact staff dashboard summarizing referrals, intakes, beds, and at‑risk items with quick navigation.
frontend/src/components/StatusHistoryTim: Displays chronological status history entries with labels, timestamps, and user info.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementTa: Allows admins to view users, assign roles, and manage pending access requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useNow.ts: Returns a timestamp that updates every minute for time‑based UI updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for calling backend actor methods related to admin checks, profiles, and various resource operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard UI with tabbed navigation for managing system resources and analytics.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a login screen using Internet Identity with an optional access request form.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerDashboard.tsx: Renders the partner dashboard with tabs for referrals, submitting new referrals, and managing the agency profile.
frontend/src/pages/StaffDashboard.tsx: Provides the staff dashboard interface with tabs for overview, referrals, intakes, and bed management.
frontend/src/utils/atRisk.ts: Contains utility functions to determine at-risk status for referrals, intakes, and beds, plus human-readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/bedTrackingPreference: Manages loading, saving, and clearing bed tracking preferences in localStorage with validation and defaults.
frontend/src/utils/referralFilters.ts: Provides filtering utilities for referrals based on program, date range, and status.
frontend/src/utils/referralSort.ts: Implements deterministic referral sorting by submission date or status with tie-breakers.
frontend/src/utils/referralValidation.ts: Validates referral form fields, checks for errors, and formats user-facing error messages.
frontend/src/utils/referralWaitingTime.t: Calculates and formats referral waiting time and checks if a referral is overdue.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and session storage.
frontend/src/utils/userDisplay.ts: Resolves a principal to a user-friendly display name, falling back to a truncated principal ID.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot of the project’s state defining schema version, platform summary, and a list of implemented feature definitions with IDs, titles, and descriptions.
